overview:
2CRisk is a cloud based health risk management software solution helping organisations improve productivity and reduce workplace injuries, globally

Our objective is to reduce the people risk exposure all organisations face throughout the employment lifecycle. Using an intuitive web based user interface, 2CRisk enables the user to manage the health risk for an employee or contractor through the following processes:

• Pre-Employment Screening • Health and Wellbeing Management • Injury and Claims Management • Exit Medical

The unique health risk assessment IP in 2CRisk is used at key stages in these processes to take complex and sometimes contradictory health and environmental information and present it to the user in simple graphical risk profiles. Areas of high and medium risk are easily identified and preventive action taken to reduce risk.

Through this process, organisations can improve productivity, reduce the number of workplace injuries and reduce their insurance premiums.

2CRisk will help you improve the health of the workforce and deliver a measurable ROI
